post.text: You don't want to miss this one: Join Hillary, President Obama, First Lady Michelle Obama, President Bill Clinton, and Chelsea Clinton live in Philly on the eve of Election Day.

comment.author: Natasha
comment.text: Wowwwww there's that many people who vote for criminals . 20 years ago this would never be happening

replies.text: Nixon? Oh, Trump is heading to court on criminal charges for Trump University. And about 70 other pending suits. Breathe, and put on your big boy pants. You might lose to a girl....
